Age.description: The age of the employee in years

Education Level.description: The highest level of education achieved by the employee

value_dict.Bachelor's: The employee has a Bachelor degree
value_dict.Master's: The employee has a Master degree
value_dict.PhD: The employee has a PhD degree

Job Title.description: The job title of the employee

Years of Experience.description: The total years of experience in the relevant field by the employee

Salary.description: The annual salary of the employee in USD

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in job salary prediction.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the age, gender, education level, job title, and years of experience of the employee, please predict the salary.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting years of professional experience.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the age, gender, education level, job title, and salary of the employee, please predict the years of experience.
prompt.answer_prompt: The predicted years of experience are ______.

prompt.role_prompt: You are an expert in predicting the age of employees.
prompt.task_prompt: Based on the gender, education level, job title, years of experience, and salary of the employee, please predict the age.
